snippet: The decision by BrightSource Energy to withdraw its initial public offering on Thursday highlights the difficulties facing the solar market. Despite a vast increase in installations, profits remain scarce.
abstract: Decision by BrightSource Energy to withdraw its initial public offering highlights the difficulties facing the solar energy market; despite a vast increase in installations, profits remain scarce.
lead_paragraph: The decision by BrightSource Energy to withdraw its initial public offering on Thursday highlights the difficulties facing the solar market. Despite a vast increase in installations, profits remain scarce.

headline.seo: Solar Industry Grapples With Market Volatility
